(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Additional path added after Base URL to access your Administrative Panel (e.g. admin, backend, control etc.).
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Dodatna pot dodana po osnovni URL za dostop do vaše nadzorne plošče (npr. admin, nadzornikova stran , kontrola, itd.)

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): After successfull installation please click the button below.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Po uspešni namestitvi prosimo kliknite na gumb spodaj.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): All packages were installed, click 'OK' to continue with installation.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Vsi paketi so nameščeni, kliknite 'OK' za nadaljevnaje namestitve.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Alternatively you could try the 'Manual Downloads and Upgrades' method.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Kot drugo možnost lahko poskusite v načinu 'Prenosi in posodobitve priročnika'.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Before you continue to your store, please make a note of your encryption key (Magento uses it to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more).
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Preden nadaljujete z vašo trgovino, vas prosimo, da si zapišete vaš šifrirni ključ (Magento ga uporablja za šifriranje gesel, kreditnih kartic in drugega).

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Check this box only if it is not possible to automatically validate Secure URL, for example if HTTP authentication is required.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Označite to polje le, če ni mogoče samodejno potrditi varen URL, na primer, če se zahteva HTTP preverjanje pristnosti.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Check this box only if it is not possible to automatically validate the Base URL.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Označite to polje le, če ni mogoče samodejno potrditi osnovni URL.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Choose this if you would like to test frontend and backend functionality.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Izberite to, če bi želeli preizkusiti funkcionalnost uporabnikove in nadzornikove strani.
Nadaljuj s polnim prenosom/ SVN namestitev

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Currently this is the most stable state available for Magento packages.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Trenutno je to najbolj stabilno stanje na voljo za pakete Magento.
Ime podatkovne baze ne sme biti prazno

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Database server does not support the InnoDB storage engine.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Strežnik podatkovne baze ne podpira InnoDB pomnilniške naprave.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Download Magento Core Modules and Updates
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Prenesi Magento Core module in posodobitve

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Downloading and installing Magento, please wait...
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Prenašam in nameščam Magento, prosimo počakajte ...

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Enable this option if you want the charts to be displayed on Dashboard.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Omogočite to možnost, če želite, da se tabele prikazujejo na nadzorni plošči.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Enable this option only if you have SSL available.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Omogočite to možnost samo, če imate SSL na voljo.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Get ready to experience Open-Source eCommerce Evolved.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Pripravite se na doživetje razvite odprtokodne spletne trgovine

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Help Us to Keep Magento Healthy
I agree to the above terms and conditions.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Strinjam se z zgoraj navedenimi pogoji.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you are a developer and would like to have the latest public updates, choose this option.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če ste razvijalec in bi želeli zadnje javne posodobitve, označite to možnost.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you are running PHP as CGI, your PHP processes may run under the same user as the user you used when uploading Magento files.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če imate nameščen PHP kot CGI, lahko tečejo vaši PHP procesi pod istim uporabnikom, ki ste ga uporabili za nalaganje Magento datotek.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you are running the install wizard over a previously downloaded and installed Magento installation, proceed with this method.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če poganjate čarovnika za namestitev čez predhodno prenešen in nameščen Magento, nadaljuje s to metodo.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you do not wish or are not able to have Magento folders writeable for the web process, you could use PEAR executable located in the root of Magento installation.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če ne želite ali če ne morete imeti Magento map zapisljivih za spletne procese, lahko uporabite PEAR izvršljivo datoteko, ki se nahaja v korenski mapi Magento namestitve.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you have downloaded the full package or installed Magento through SVN, you should skip packages installation and validation by clicking the button below.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če ste prenesli polni paket ali namestili Magento preko SVN, prekočite nameščanje in preverjanje paketov s klikom na spodnji gumb.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you wish to manage Magento packages through the web admin interface, you will need to have web writeable permissions applied to all Magento folders and files.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če želite upravljati Magento pakete preko nadzorne plošče, potrebujete dovoljenje za pisanje v vse Magento mape in datoteke

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If your server is running on MS Windows, most probably you will not need to change anything.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Če vaš strežnik teče na MS Windows, vam najverjetneje ne bo treba spreminjati ničesar.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): In other cases you will need to make Magento files writeable for the user that the web server process is running under.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): V drugih primerih boste morali narediti Magento datoteke zapisljive za uporabnika, pod katerim tečejo procesi spletnega strežnika

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Magento is a trademark of Magento Inc. Copyright © %s Magento Inc.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Magento je blagovna znamka Magento Inc. Avtorske pravice; %s Magento Inc.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Magento uses this key to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more. If this field is left empty the system will create an encryption key for you and will display it on the next page.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Magento uporablja ta ključ za šifriranje gesel, kreditnih kartic in drugega. Če to polje pustite prazno, bo sistem ustvaril šifrirni ključ za vas in ga prikazal na naslednji strani.

(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Ena od PHP razširitev "%s" mora biti naložena.

(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Prosimo, popravite uporabniške podatke in poskusite znova.

(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Prosimo, prepričajte se, da je mod_rewrite omogočena v Apache konfiguraciji.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please note that it is much less stable than beta.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Prosimo upoštevajte, da je precej manj stabilna kot beta.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please note that only UNIX, Linux and Mac OS X shells are currently supported. For Windows use the '%s' option.

(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Predpona tabel bi morala vsebovati le črke (a-z), števila (0-9) ali podčrtaje (_), prvi znak mora biti črka.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): There was a problem installing Magento packages. Please read the log, correct errors and try again.
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Prišlo je do težave pri nameščanju Magento paketov. Prosimo, preberite dnevnik, popravite napake in poskusite znova.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.):
You can specify server port, ex.: localhost:3307
If you are not using default UNIX socket, you can specify it here instead of host, ex.: /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.):
Lahko določite vrata strežnika, prime: localhost:3307
Če ne uporabljate privzete vtičnice UNIX, jo lahko navedete tukaj namesto gostitelja, npr:. / var / run / mysqld / mysqld.sock

(Hranite ga na varnem mestu.): Lahko mogočite to možnost, da uporabite opravilno funkcionalnost spletnega strežnika  za boljšo optimizacijo iskalnikov.
